import React, {Component} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default class UserProfile extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state={ username: '', description: '', inGameName: '', gamesPlayed: '', typeOfGamer: '', preferredGame: '', editMode: false } } componentDidMount(){ axios.get("http://localhost:5000/users/" + this.props.match.params.id) .then(res => { if (res.status == 200) { this.setState({ username: res.data.username, description: res.data.profile.description, inGameName: res.data.profile.inGameName, typeOfGamer: res.data.profile.typeOfGamer, preferredGame: res.data.profile.preferredGame }) } }) } setEdit =() => { this.setState({ editMode:true }) } onChangeDescription = (e) => { this.setState({ description: e.target.value }) } onChangeTypeOfGamer= (e) => { this.setState({ typeOfGamer: e.target.value }) } onChangePreferredGame = (e) => { this.setState({ preferredGame: e.target.value }) } onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const User ={ description: this.state.description, typeOfGamer: this.state.typeOfGamer, preferredGame: this.state.preferredGame } axios.put("http://localhost:5000/users/"+ window.sessionStorage.getItem("id"), User) .then(res => console.log(res.data)) window.location = "/" } render(){ const idOwner = window.sessionStorage.getItem("id") if(idOwner == this.props.match.params.id && this.state.editMode == true ){ return(

{this.state.username}
